        public SlideMenu(Context context)
        Constructor used by the inflation apparatus. To be able to use the SlideMenu, call the init() method.

      • SlideMenu

        public SlideMenu(Activity act,
         int menuResource,
         SlideMenuInterface.OnSlideMenuItemClickListener cb,
         int slideDuration)
        Constructs a SlideMenu with the given menu XML.
        Parameters:
        act - The calling activity.
        menuResource - Menu resource identifier.
        cb - Callback to be invoked on menu item click.
        slideDuration - Slide in/out duration in milliseconds.

      • SlideMenu

        public SlideMenu(Activity act,
         SlideMenuInterface.OnSlideMenuItemClickListener cb,
         int slideDuration)
        Constructs an empty SlideMenu.
        Parameters:
        act - The calling activity.
        cb - Callback to be invoked on menu item click.
        slideDuration - Slide in/out duration in milliseconds.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init(Activity act,
        int menuResource,
        SlideMenuInterface.OnSlideMenuItemClickListener cb,
        int slideDuration)
        If inflated from XML, initializes the SlideMenu.
        Parameters:
        act - The calling activity.
        menuResource - Menu resource identifier, can be 0 for an empty SlideMenu.
        cb - Callback to be invoked on menu item click.
        slideDuration - Slide in/out duration in milliseconds.

        Sets an optional image to be displayed on top of the menu.

        Slide the menu in.

      • setAsShown
